title: Share price of Chola Inv Finance jumps as Sensex drops 51.85 points - Economic Times
content: Share price of Chola Inv Finance jumps as Sensex drops 51.85 points  Economic Times
description: Promoters held 51.55 per cent stake in the company as of 31-Dec-2021, while FII and DII ownership stood at 17.65 per cent and 18.31 per cent, respectively.
